title: 求助HMCL无法登入游戏
author: pink_sheep
txt_content:
报错全提示：
Command: "C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Java\\jre1.8.0_221\\bin\\java.exe" -Dminecraft.client.jar=.minecraft\versions\1.14\1.14.jar -XX:+UnlockExperimentalVMOptions -XX:+UseG1GC -XX:G1NewSizePercent=20
